member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoServer.RequestDone
member.summary: Lets the server know that this thread is done with a series of related operations. Instead of calling this method it is better to put the return value of RequestStart in a using statement.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoServer.RequestStart(MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase)
member.summary: Lets the server know that this thread is about to begin a series of related operations that must all occur on the same connection. The return value of this method implements IDisposable and can be placed in a using statement (in which case RequestDone will be called automatically when leaving the using statement).
member.param: One of the databases involved in the related operations.
member.returns: A helper object that implements IDisposable and calls from the Dispose method.

member.param: One of the databases involved in the related operations.
member.returns: A helper object that implements IDisposable and calls from the Dispose method.

member.summary: Lets the server know that this thread is about to begin a series of related operations that must all occur on the same connection. The return value of this method implements IDisposable and can be placed in a using statement (in which case RequestDone will be called automatically when leaving the using statement).
member.param: One of the databases involved in the related operations.
member.returns: A helper object that implements IDisposable and calls from the Dispose method.

member.summary: Lets the server know that this thread is about to begin a series of related operations that must all occur on the same connection. member.param: One of the databases involved in the related operations.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.RequestDone
member.summary: Lets the server know that this thread is done with a series of related operations. Instead of calling this method it is better to put the return value of RequestStart in a using statement.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.RequestStart
member.summary: Lets the server know that this thread is about to begin a series of related operations that must all occur on the same connection. The return value of this method implements IDisposable and can be placed in a using statement (in which case RequestDone will be called automatically when leaving the using statement).
member.returns: A helper object that implements IDisposable and calls from the Dispose method.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.RequestStart(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Lets the server know that this thread is about to begin a series of related operations that must all occur on the same connection. The return value of this method implements IDisposable and can be placed in a using statement (in which case RequestDone will be called automatically when leaving the using statement).
member.param: Whether queries should be sent to secondary servers.
member.returns: A helper object that implements IDisposable and calls from the Dispose method.

member.name: M:MongoDB.Driver.MongoDatabase.RequestStart(MongoDB.Driver.ReadPreference)
member.summary: Lets the server know that this thread is about to begin a series of related operations that must all occur on the same connection. member.returns: A helper object that implements IDisposable and calls from the Dispose method.
